attributes.action: Please don't borrow if we, tax payers, will have to face a huge bill in the future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stimulating the economy by more borrowing appears in equivalent to a normal person paying off a credit card bill with another credit card, never the solution. Better to endure the bad consequences immediately and pay for them than have temporary quiet period and have to pay for an increased time later.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
